entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 13 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 17 February 2023
